content.title: Adding Conditions for Sign Up
content.body:
1. From the top-right corner of the Action Editor, select the Design View.
  2. In the Action Editor left menu, under Conditions, select If.
  3. In the Action Editor right pane, you will notice:
    • Condition Type  is selected as If 
    • Criteria is selected as Satisfy All
  4. Click on the box below Widget Property drop-down.
    You will notice your project's forms and widgets being listed in a hierarchy. 
  5. Navigate to Mobile Forms > frmRegistration > ACMERegister > flxACMERegister and select tbxEmail.
  6. Select text in the right pane.
